columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the associated campaign (references campaign entity outside this table).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman / sales representative associated with the campaign.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Creation date of the record (stored as CHAR(10) in MM/DD/YYYY format in this table).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the address record.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: First line of the address in the original language (often street and number).

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Second line of the address (apartment, suite or additional info).

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Third line of the address (typically city and postal code in the original language).

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth line of the address (typically country name in the original language).

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate for the address (float). Coordinates appear to be in a local or projected coordinate system.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate for the address (float). Coordinates appear to be in a local or projected coordinate system.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Code indicating the geocoding model/type used for the address (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model used to resolve this address (text).

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding lookup was performed (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Quality score returned by the geocoding model (higher = better match).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Geocoding reference identifier for street 1 (text, usually an external geocoding id).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Geocoding reference identifier for street 2 (text, nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Geocoding reference identifier for the locality (text, nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal code as determined by the geocoding model (text).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Country table (dbo.Country.ID). May be null when country not resolved.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string sent to the geocoding service (often the full address used for lookup).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model for street 1 (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number returned by the geocoding model for street 1 (text to preserve non-numeric formats).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Street name text returned for street 2 by the geocoding model (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Street number returned for street 2 by the geocoding model (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or place name returned by the geocoding model (original language, e.g., city or village).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude returned by the geocoding model stored as text (may be same system as Longitude or a different textual form).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude returned by the geocoding model stored as text (may be same system as Latitude or a different textual form).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical or coded representation of broader geographic areas returned by geocoding (string of area codes).

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Numeric postal/ZIP code for the address (integer).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative area determined by the geocoding model (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood returned by the geocoding model (original language, nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key used to link this address to other datasets or data maps (internal mapping key).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or data map table that contributed this address record (internal reference).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used in data mapping (nullable; often empty).

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character type code from the geocode provider indicating match category (nullable).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1 field was manually overridden by a user (bit/boolean).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: First line of the address in English (preferred human-readable label for addresses).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Second line of the address in English (apartment, suite or additional info, nullable).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Third line of the address in English (typically city and postal code, a useful searchable field).

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Fourth line of the address in English (country name, usually 'Greece' for sample rows).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Geocoding-derived street name for street1 in English (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Geocoding-derived street name for street2 in English (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality or place name returned by geocoding in English (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative area returned by the geocoding model in English (nullable).

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighborhood returned by geocoding in English (nullable).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the English Line1 field was manually overridden by a user (bit/boolean).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number for street1 returned by the geocoding model in English (text to preserve formatting).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Street number for street2 returned by the geocoding model in English (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advanced payment policy record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description or notes about the payment policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or account that created the policy.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value applied by this policy (when applicable).

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Maximum monetary limit (cap) for the policy; currency value.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule/expression (XAML/CodeDom) that determines policy applicability.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active.

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Stored calculation logic or expression used to compute advance amounts for this policy.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount associated with the policy (currency).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advanced discount policy record.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the discount classification or type.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Descriptive text explaining the discount policy rules or purpose.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the discount policy is active and may be applied.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or account that created the discount policy.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Default discount percentage applied by the policy (when configured).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary discount amount (currency) applied by the policy, if any.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional serialized rule or expression that determines when the discount applies.

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether discount should apply at unit (per-item) level.

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage for bundle tier 1, if defined.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage for bundle tier 2, if defined.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage for bundle tier 3, if defined.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage for bundle tier 4, if defined.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Fallback discount percentage for other bundle sizes, if defined.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that can be applied by this policy.

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage allowed for a supervisor role.

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage allowed for an area manager role.

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage allowed for a sales manager role.

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage allowed for a salesperson.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart numeric key used for external integration or mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data-mart table name used for external mapping or ETL.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart string key used for external integration or mapping.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount percentage for product slot 1, if configured.

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount percentage for product slot 2, if configured.

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount percentage for product slot 3, if configured.

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount percentage for product slot 4, if configured.

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Fallback product-specific discount percentage for other products, if configured.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of why an advertisement was deactivated. Values are stored in Greek (e.g., 'Λήξη Προβολής').

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short text label or code describing the sales type (examples: ST1, ST2, ST3).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to link this sales type to an external data mart or reference table. Often null in this dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table that corresponds to this sales type. May be null when no external mapping exists.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-key value used for external system mapping or lookup for this sales type. May be null when not applicable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code value for the archived number (business code or legacy number).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this archived number record is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the archived number; foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number (system login name).

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition; part of the composite primary key and references dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the available operand for the rule condition; part of the composite primary key and references dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank (primary key). Integer surrogate key used to reference a bank record.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the bank. Contains the official bank name (may include non-Latin characters).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the bank record is active (True) or inactive (False). Used to filter current banks.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity/process to which this attribute mapping applies. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the legacy or source attribute being replaced or mapped. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the new or target attribute that the old attribute maps to during migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with this mapping (likely references an Activity or ActivityLog table).

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (old) attribute value before migration; used as the human-readable reference for the mapping.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value that the old value maps to after migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity that contains or triggered the keyword mapping (likely references an Activity table).

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword being mapped; used as the primary human-readable reference for this mapping row.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value corresponding to the keyword after migration.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source record that will be merged. Represents the record being consolidated into a target.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record that the source record will be merged into.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (old) attribute value that should be replaced during migration.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that will replace the initial old attribute value.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the original keyword to be replaced. Acts as part of the composite primary key for the replacement mapping.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that should replace the original keyword. Acts as part of the composite primary key for the replacement mapping.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier for the activity. Part of the composite primary key tying an activity to a specific attribute value.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute value associated with the activity. Part of the composite primary key linking the activity to its attribute value.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the business activity or category (numeric).

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Activity / category name in Greek (NVARCHAR, Greek collation). Useful for Greek-language display and lookups.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: Activity / category name in English. Chosen as the human-readable label for records.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Surrogate/identifier for the geographic area (unique code like S80125)

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Concatenated display name for the area (localized, primary human-readable label)

attributes.name: Name_ΟΝΟΜΑΣΤΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Area name in nominative form (Greek)

attributes.name: Name_ΓΕΝΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Area name in genitive form (Greek) - may be empty for many rows

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional specifiers/qualifiers for the area name (e.g., admin qualifiers)

attributes.name: AttributeId
attributes.description: Identifier for the attribute category/type (e.g., 155)

attributes.name: AttributeType
attributes.description: Numeric/type code describing attribute grouping

attributes.name: AttributeName
attributes.description: Logical name of the attribute (e.g., Internet_Cities)

attributes.name: AttributeLanguageId
attributes.description: Language identifier for attribute metadata (e.g., 1032)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the attribute value (unique per attribute values)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable label/value for the attribute (localized string)

attributes.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
attributes.description: Language identifier for the attribute value

attributes.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes (nullable)

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate key for the calendar row.

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Full calendar date (datetime).

attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: Calendar year extracted from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: Month
attributes.description: Month name extracted from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: Day
attributes.description: Day of month extracted from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description or holiday name (Greek text).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the star rating value.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Star rating label (e.g., '1 star', '2 stars').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the star rating (stored as string in source). Sample values: 13..17

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable star rating label in Greek (e.g. '1 αστέρι', '5 αστέρια'). Use this for display and user-facing filters.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the transaction channel value (stored as string). Sample values: 109399, 109400, 109401.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable transaction channel label in Greek (e.g. 'Κάντε κράτηση', 'Online Παραγγελία'). Use for display and filtering by channel.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the unit type (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Localized (English) name of the unit type (e.g., Hotel, Hotel Boutique)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the unit type (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Localized (Greek) name of the unit type

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the functional month (string). Distinct count indicates 12 month values.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name label. Note: source values contain trailing delimiters ('||') that should be trimmed for display and matching.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the functional month (string). Distinct count indicates 12 month values.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek month name label (UTF-8). Note: source values contain trailing delimiters ('||') that should be trimmed for display and matching.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/string identifier for the payment method

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English localized label/description of the payment method (may contain trailing delimiters)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/string identifier for the payment method

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek localized label/description of the payment method (may contain trailing delimiters)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string). Values observed: 60, 61, 62, 63.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable label for number of room keys in English (e.g., '1 key', '2 keys'). Treat as categorical text for display and filtering.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string). Matches the English variant ids (60, 61, 62, 63).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable label for number of room keys in Greek (e.g., '1 κλειδί', '2 κλειδιά'). Categorical text intended for display and filtering.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier / code for the arrival time value

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time expressed in 24-hour format (HH:MM) - English view

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier / code for the arrival time value

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time expressed in 24-hour format (HH:MM) - Greek view

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the departure time value (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time formatted as HH:MM (English view)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Extracted hour component from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Extracted minute component from AttributeValue (typically 00)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the departure time value (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time formatted as HH:MM (Greek view / localized)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Extracted hour component from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Extracted minute component from AttributeValue (typically 00)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season month value (string code)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Display name of the high-season month (English). May contain delimiters (e.g., trailing '||').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season month value (string code)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Display name of the high-season month (Greek). May contain delimiters (e.g., trailing '||').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the low season attribute value (string). Use to join or sort. Values are system ids (e.g. 129..140).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Low season month name in English (raw). Values may include trailing delimiters (e.g. 'January||'). Recommended to trim delimiters for display and mapping to canonical month names.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded in the AdvancedPaymentMethod table.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Total number of payment records (rows) in this fact.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerPayment
measures.description: Average payment amount (only considers non-null Amount values).

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest payment Amount in the dataset.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest payment Amount in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctBankCount
measures.description: Number of distinct banks referenced by BankID (excludes nulls).

measures.name: CollectedPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CollectionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that have a CollectionDate (i.e., collected).

measures.name: BankDepositedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that have a BankDepositDate (i.e., deposited to bank).

measures.name: CheckPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL OR CheckPublisher IS NOT NULL OR CheckPublishDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that appear to be checks (presence of check number, publisher, or publish date).

measures.name: PercentCollected
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CollectionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of payments that have been collected (CollectionDate present).

measures.name: TotalPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount (mostly null in sample data) — included for completeness where policy-level amounts are recorded.

measures.name: PaymentRecordCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) represented in the table.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of Amount values. Represents the total monetary value recorded for these payment method records.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per payment record. Nulls are ignored by the AVG aggregation.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount value observed in the dataset.

measures.name: TotalPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values (where present). Useful when policy-specific amounts are captured separately from Amount.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types present in the filtered result set.

measures.name: NullAmountCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Amount IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where Amount is null. Helps identify incomplete payment records.

display.notes: CollectionDate is recommended as the primary time dimension when analyzing monetary trends. Many auxiliary columns (credit card fields, check fields) are sparsely populated and should be used as filters/segments rather than primary groupings unless data completeness is confirmed.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of associations (rows) linking an advanced payment method to a sales collection.

measures.name: Distinct Advanced Payment Methods
measures.description: Number of distinct advanced payment methods represented in this table for the applied filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Sales Collections
measures.description: Number of distinct sales collections represented in this table for the applied filter context.

measures.name: Advertisement Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (row count).

measures.name: Gross Price
measures.description: Sum of the listed price for advertisements.

measures.name: Total Discount
measures.expression: SUM(Discount + RulesDiscount + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) + COALESCE(AlteredAmount,0))
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount-related amounts applied to advertisements (explicit discounts, rules-based discounts, payment/product/bundle discounts and any altered amount).

measures.name: Net Price
measures.expression: SUM(Price) - SUM(Discount) - SUM(RulesDiscount) - SUM(COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0)) - SUM(COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0)) - SUM(COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0))
measures.description: Gross price less aggregated discounts. Represents the net revenue-related amount from pricing (excludes separate one-time charges and extra fees).

measures.name: One-time Charges Total
measures.description: Total of one-time charges before/after discounts.

measures.name: Extra Fees Total
measures.description: Aggregate of extra fee amounts in various stages (original, after discount, after credit-card adjustments).

measures.name: Actual Spent Budget
measures.description: Total actual budget spent associated with advertisements (where available).

measures.name: Budget Amount Total
measures.description: Sum of budgeted amounts for advertisements (where provided).

measures.name: Budget Utilization
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(BudgetAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ActualSpentBudget) / SUM(BudgetAmount) END
measures.description: Ratio of actual spent budget to budgeted amount. Null when no budget is present.

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average listed price per advertisement.

measures.name: Average Planned Duration (days)
measures.description: Average planned/run duration in days between advertisement begin and end (uses current date when end date is null).

measures.name: Verified Advertisements
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements marked as verified.

measures.name: Subscription-based Advertisements
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements that are subscription-based.

measures.name: Deposit Count
measures.description: Number of deposit records (rows) in BankDepositDetail.

measures.name: Distinct Deposit Numbers
measures.description: Number of unique deposit identifiers (BankDepositNumber). Useful for deduplicating or counting unique deposit references.

measures.name: Distinct Banks
measures.description: Number of distinct banks referenced by these deposit records.

measures.name: First Deposit Date
measures.description: Earliest BankDepositDate in the current result set (first deposit timestamp).

measures.name: Last Deposit Date
measures.description: Latest BankDepositDate in the current result set (most recent deposit timestamp).

measures.name: Average Deposits per Bank
measures.description: Average number of deposit records per distinct bank within the current result set. NULL when no banks are present.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of extraction events (one row per event).

measures.name: DistinctEventDays
measures.description: Number of distinct calendar days on which extraction events occurred.

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events recorded with Status = 0. Note: status codes are inferred from sample values; Status = 0 is treated as success by convention in these measures.

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Status is not 0 (interpreted as failures or non-success states).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of events with Status = 0 (success) out of all events. NULL when there are no events.

measures.name: FirstEventTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest recorded extraction event in the aggregation.

measures.name: LastEventTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the latest recorded extraction event in the aggregation.

measures.name: AverageMessageLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Text messages associated with events. NULLs are ignored.

measures.name: DistinctMessageCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Text messages seen in the events.

display.notes: Type and Status code mappings are inferred from sample text and values; verify against source system documentation for authoritative meanings.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded batch actions (one row per action).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more actions recorded.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all actions (sum of RowsAffected).

measures.name: RowsAffectedAvg
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action.

measures.name: RowsAffectedMax
measures.description: Maximum number of rows affected by a single action.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of actions per batch (total actions divided by distinct batches).

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with Status = 1. (Assumes Status = 1 indicates success; adjust if status codes differ.)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with Status = 0. (Assumes Status = 0 indicates failure/error; adjust if status codes differ.)

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: MostRecentAction
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent recorded action.

measures.name: EarliestAction
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest recorded action.

use_cases: Operational monitoring (recent failures, high rows-affected events)
Batch performance (average rows affected, actions per batch)
Audit trail (most recent/earliest action per batch)
